#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
void solve() {
    ll N, A, M;
    scanf("%lld %lld %lld", &N, &A, &M); --A;
    A = (A + M) % N;++A;
    printf("%lld\n", A);
}
int main() {
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--) solve();
}
